enum  Enum { eQUAD_DIAGONAL = (1<<0) }

Detailed Description

Flags which describe how cooking should treat a cloth mesh edge.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum PxClothMeshEdgeFlag::Enum

Enumerator:
eQUAD_DIAGONAL  The edge was only added to convert a quad into triangles (marking these edges allows to reconstruct quads).
